name: autoreact

set.name: set
set.description: Sets an auto-reaction for a channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to set the auto-reaction for.

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Removes the auto-reaction from a channel.

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The channel to remove the auto-reaction from.

general_error: An error occurred while managing auto-reactions.
